title: Remaining Relative visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Remaining Relative visa (Subclass 835), a permanent visa for individuals whose only close family members live in Australia. It outlines eligibility requirements, costs, processing times, obligations, and visa conditions. It also includes updates on importing paper applications into ImmiAccount starting 23 July 2025.

visa_details.description: This permanent visa lets people stay in Australia to be with their only close family members.
stay_conditions: Sponsor relatives to come to Australia
Attend free Adult Migrant English Program classes (if eligible)

notes: Unlimited travel in and out of Australia while travel facility is valid
After 5 years, must apply for a Resident Return Visa (RRV) or consider Australian citizenship
Citizenship requires obtaining and using an Australian passport

important_updates.exceptions: Some applications lodged outside Australia before 25 June 2020 cannot be imported into ImmiAccount

eligibility.location_requirement: Must be in Australia when you apply and when your application is decided
eligibility.remaining_relative_requirement: Must be a remaining relative of an Australian citizen, permanent resident, or eligible New Zealand citizen

near_relatives_requirement.description: Applicant or partner must not have other near relatives living outside Australia or living in Australia on temporary visas or unlawfully

assurance_of_support.description: Ensures applicant will not rely on government assistance

include_family.when: At application time or before decision
requirements: Family members applying must meet health and character requirements
Non‑migrating family members may also need to meet requirements

costs.additional_charges: Additional charge applies for each family member
costs.payment_structure: Two instalments — first at application, second when requested

notes: Demand for Other Family visas exceeds available places
Visa processing time guide tool provides indications only
delays_may_occur_if: Incorrect visa application charge is paid
processing_times.queueing_policy: Applications are subject to capping and queueing

obligations_and_conditions.obey_laws: Applicant and family members must obey all Australian laws
obligations_and_conditions.visa_label: Visa is digitally linked to passport; no physical label provided

links: Update to ImmiAccount — new online services for paper‑based applications
VEVO for checking travel facility end date
